thread.section_title: Asia Business, Finance & Political News - The Wall Street Journal
thread.title: HTC Swings to Net Loss in 3rd Quarter
thread.title_full: HTC Swings to Net Loss in 3rd Quarter - WSJ

author: Lorraine Luk
title: HTC Swings to Net Loss in 3rd Quarter
text:
HTC Corp. said Monday it swung to a net loss in the third quarter as it continued to struggle in the competitive smartphone market.
Taiwan-based HTC said its net loss for the three months ended Sept. 30 was NT$4.48 billion (US$138 million) compared with a net profit of NT$0.6 billion a year earlier. Its revenue also dropped sharply to NT$21.4 billion from NT$41.9 billion in the same period last year.
The downbeat results...
